messages.content:
Hey! How are you?
I have a favor to ask of you. As you know, I volunteer with U&I, the Bangalore-based NGO that works with underprivileged children and the differently-abled. U&I currently operates in eight cities across India and have 21 Learning Centers that impact 850 people every week.
We've been nominated by iVolunteer for an award that recognizes organizations that engage volunteers.
Here's where you come in! We would be super grateful if you could vote for us and message 10 other friends who would do the same.
It just takes 3 simple steps:
1. Click on http://www.ivolunteerawards.org/vote/leader-in-volunteer-engagement/
2. Select U&I and click on 'Vote Now'
3. Register and cast your vote
Thanks so much for your support!
Hi bro. I need your help. I've got one baby pigeon. Its not eating or doing anything. What should I do??
